command.question: On host 'ALU-SUPPORT-PROD-01', what is the full path of the `/tmp/.X11-unix/Xrootkit` file?
command.query: SELECT Name, FilePath, CreationTime, ModificationTime FROM filesystem(host="ALU-SUPPORT-PROD-01") WHERE FilePath = "/tmp/.X11-unix/Xrootkit"

result: [SIMULATION] Velociraptor artifact collection was dispatched, but this is a simulation so no data was returned.

command.question: What is the current state of the Xrootkit process (`/usr/bin/xr`) on this host? Is it still running?
command.query: SELECT Name, CommandLine, PPID, StartTime, EndTime FROM processes(host="ALU-SUPPORT-PROD-01") WHERE CommandLine =~ "/usr/bin/xr"

command.question: List all files created or modified within the past 24 hours in `/tmp/.X11-unix`. Are there any unusual files?
command.query: SELECT Name, FilePath, CreationTime, ModificationTime FROM filesystem(host="ALU-SUPPORT-PROD-01", dirPath="/tmp/.X11-unix") WHERE CreationTime > now() - 24 * 3600 OR ModificationTime > now() - 24 * 3600
